text:
@TomFitton Dear Sir, 
Please contact me urgent. I believe Artesunat medicine can treatment covid19. I had used artesunat ( cloroquin or quinin) treatment high fever by virus get good result, after 36-48hrs patient will regain healthy and high fever gone. Please Sir, please and please!
